title: What is Fidiah and on whom is it Obligatory? - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: could you explain for the benefit of the viewers what is fidia and on whom is it obligatory the word fidya means the compensation for a fast which could not be kept due to some permanent disability or some disease as the Quran mentioned in Surah Bak chapter number two ver number 184 that if it's difficult for a person to fast then he can feed one indent person one poor person so if a person who has permanent disability is permanently sick or he's very old and can't fast then he should feed one poor person for every fast he has missed and this is called as fidya
